It is a device that allows users to access the Internet, send and receive text messages, make phone calls, take pictures and play music.
A smartphone is a small hand-held computer that is able to connect to the Internet and run apps.
A smartphone is a mobile phone that has a touchscreen, camera, and Internet access.
